result.reason: The PuTTY window resize on resume likely conflicts with the window restoration process; deferring the resize via BeginInvoke should allow the UI to settle first.
result.approach: Modify OnPowerModeChanged in PuttyBase.cs to wrap the Resize call in InterfaceControl.BeginInvoke to ensure it runs after the main UI thread has finished processing the resume event.
